metadata.title: Women's Slouchy Beanie Chemo Hat Baggy Sleep Cap Infinity Scarf
features: Material: Beanie hat is made of premium material 95% organic cotton and 5% spandex, breathable, soft, comfortable,lightweight and skin-friendly, well stretchy and easy to wear. It can protect your head.

One size fits most: The cotton slouchy beanie with good stretch, suitable for all most ladies, so do not worry about that the size won't fit you. The hat will stay on your head comfortably and snugly.

Versatile Accessory: Chemo hats is a multi-style hat. You can wear it as a slouchy beanie, ponytail hat or infinity scarf. The hat will perfectly highlight your charm no matter how you wear it. Also for cancer patients. Simple but timeless.

All Occasions: Lightweight beanie hats, slouchy, simple but timeless. Excellent for hair loss or sleeping to conceal hair or to protect the head. Suitable for indoor or outdoor activities, shopping, staying at home at ease, going hiking, outing or journey in spring, summer, fall or winter.

Fashion & Leisure: The most popular fashion ponytail hats, all-match trend. Match well with your wardrobe. The exquisite appearance will perfectly highlight your fashion sense. Stylish and popular, it will surprise you with its infinite charm. Besides, it is a wonderful sweet present to your families and friends.
description: Solid color is made from soft stretch cotton knit fabric. The fabric is breathable, lightweight and comfortable. We offer a variety of colors and prints for your everyday wardrobe, or for special occasions. It can also be worn as a scarf and headscarf for a good touch.
The soft feel of this hat is perfect for women with sensitive scalp because it won't itch or scratch.
